item.title: LatLongUtils.zoomForBounds problem?
item.description:
From ivan.mar...@gmail.com on October 18, 2014 20:54:24
What steps will reproduce the problem? Get attached ZoomToBounds.java and Update ZoomToBounds class in Samples projects. Start "ZoomToBounds" sample
What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
The markers will always appear outside the MapView area.
What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 0.4.3 0.5.0-rc1 0.5.0-rc2
Please provide any additional information below.
Try to uncomment
dimension = new Dimension((int)(dimension.width / 2f), (int)(dimension.height / 2f));
Markers will be displayed inside the area
What's wrong ?
Attachment: ZoomToBounds.java
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=534
